title: techs. PLEASE help me out here
body: so yesterday i tried logging onto league on a computer that had it installed already but it had been a while since i played on this particular pc. it was giving me issues so i tried to re download it and it is downloaded to my pc but when i click the league short cut and it begins to install it gets to 33 percent and sits forever. lastnight it went for 4 hours and after a while i got a pop up saying it was intrupted and now im trying again with no luck, is there a solution anyone has for me??

replies.body:
Hold on shift when you start. 
Then press spacebar after you finish.
Also use the enter key.

Punctuationsâ„¢ helps. Download it.

But in all seriousness, check your DNS settings, firewalls and/or virus scans. Those things may be impeding your download.
